BABY BULLETIN: 9 days overdue. I'm questioning whether this "baby" might really be "mint cookies". Induction sched. for Jan. 27.
BABY BULLETIN: 8 days overdue and the midwife is doing unmentionable things in the next room to move him along. Saying cervix a lot.
@KatGreenbrook @SUNZ2016 Working on May 11. Will lock in and notify peeps soon.
BABY BULLETIN: Jess is faking contractions to get out of washing dishes.
@PatD ouch. Her family is here for the next six weeks. Hopefully he's not that DGAF
BABY BULLETIN: Four days late and still no sign of bubs.

@drkilometer @joealindsey sweet! Come over whenevs. Fire starts around 8. Plenty of leftover chili too...

@drkilometer @joealindsey Either way. My parents would love to feed you. Smokehouse chili and homemade beer bread. Joe can you swing it?
@drkilometer @joealindsey My parents are dead keen to keep me home tonight. Offered to have you boys up for dinner and a few campfire IPAs?
@drkilometer @joealindsey sorry dudes! Missed these tweets. Plan is Detroit tomorrow. Joe you're welcome to join. Otherwise Fri in Toledo.
@joealindsey cool man. I'll be in town Tuesday to Friday. Detroit Thursday. Wed or Fri is best I reckon.
@joealindsey at least lock your freezer. Will you take me out for a decent beer in Toledo?
